admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc:
General water, sanitation and flood
            protection sector
trustfund:
TF037812-BULGARIA - ENVIRONMENTAL
            REMEDIATION PILOT,TF037732-BULGARIA - ENV. REMED. AND
            PRIV. SUP.,TF035374-BULGARIA - POLLUTION ABATEMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The main object of the Environmental
            Remediation Pilot Project is to support the Government of
            Bulgaria in (i) reducing environmental hazards caused by
            past pollution and unsafe environmental management practices
            at MDK Copper Smelter (MDK); (ii) facilitating private
            investments in the company; and (iii) contributing to
            improvements in the environmental performance of the plant.
            This pilot project is envisaged to become a model for
            addressing past environmental damages and environmental
            damages and environmental liabilities in the process of
            privatization. The components include a emergency
            remediation program and the remediation of past
            environmental damages.
